Description:
Detects password change for the logged-on user's via "ksetup.exe"

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Logged-On User Password Change Via Ksetup.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '% /changepassword %' and (process_path like '%\ksetup.exe' and original_file_name = 'ksetup.exe'))
